synopsis.text: Shi Li, born under mysterious celestial events, becomes the vessel of a powerful warrior's residual soul, making him a target for various clans worldwide. To protect their child, Shi's parents entrust him to Yuan Chenyang, who raises him as a fisherman in the tranquil Linhai City. As Shi matures, he yearns to join a clan and cultivate his powers, hoping to locate his missing parents. Stumbling upon a sinister plot, he uncovers a demonic tribe's plan to transform Linhai's inhabitants into sustenance. With the enigmatic Ying Gou and the formation master Bai Xiang involved, a conspiracy looms, threatening to engulf the clans scattered across the mountains and seas. Will Shi Li rise to the challenge and save his city?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
